entries.name: remote
entries.desc: A StaticSet ignores remote because it has a fixed set of gems.

entries.name: new(specs)
entries.desc: Creates a new StaticSet for the given specs

entries.name: find_all(dep)
entries.desc: Finds all gems matching dep in this set.

entries.name: load_spec(name, ver, platform, source)
entries.desc: Loads a Gem::Specification from this set which has the given name, version ver, platform.  The source is ignored.
